Text:
This is fantastic - same with your other ebook uploads. Thank you very much for taking the time to share.

In terms of requests, do you have 20th century literature (especially British, Irish, French, USA and Russian)? What about Latin American literature (especially in the original Spanish)?

Sorry for not answering sooner.
Yes i have uploadet world literature which has Russian and many other nations literature, please check it out and see if you can find something. Regarding American, i am going to upload a colection of American literature soon.
